title: Restricting Sheen Items
body:
Why is it that we can buy two Sheen items?
It's wasted stats and the effects don't stack.

They should be restricted like the Hydras so that idiots can no longer do it.

replies.body: its bad and its a waste of gold but its fun :)
I like to buy {{item:3025}} and {{item:3078}} Please don't take that away from me!
It's a learning curve I guess :P
